name: The Life Story of the City of Los Angeles v2 V2

metadata.name: The Life Story of the City of Los Angeles v2
metadata.description:
This is an original art piece depicting the life story of the city of Los Angeles (Version 2). A great purchase or gift for anyone who loves this fun, colorful, and artsy city...

A fun, colorful, and artsy hand-drawn digital illustration laid out like a map of LA covering the coast, hills, and city areas that highlight the most well-known spots and landmarks throughout the city of LA. 

Since Sagen.Life focuses on telling life stories, important years can be seen on or next to each iconic landmark, key location, and important moment in the city's history from 1872 to the present day.

Ideal for collectors of one-of-a-kind Los Angeles memorabilia or anyone interested in leveraging the piece as a business opportunity. Owning this special piece will allow you to sell prints at scale to both B2B (museums, airports, government buildings, cultural centers) and B2C (those who love LA and art) customers. Also ideal to be positioned as a housewarming or going away gift.

This art piece was proudly produced in the heart of the Arts District in downtown Los Angeles, CA.
